mapper.select: select branch.black_index, branch.black_subject, branch.subject_nickname, branch.black_object, obj.acc_nickname object_nickname, branch.black_content, branch.black_enrolldate from (select stem.black_index, stem.black_subject, acc.acc_nickname subject_nickname, stem.black_object, stem.black_content, stem.black_enrolldate from BLACKLIST stem join ACCOUNT acc on (stem.black_subject = acc.acc_index)) branch join (select stem.black_index, acc.acc_nickname from BLACKLIST stem join ACCOUNT acc on (stem.black_object = acc.acc_index)) obj on (branch.black_index = obj.black_index) order by black_index desc
